page.title: 15RELIGION IN LINTON
page.content: There are three churches in Linton, the Church of England,the United Reformed Church and the Salvation Army Citadel.There are 3 services held each week.Linton has 3 vicars who take the services,most of which are held on a Sunday.In an ordinary service there are hymns,readings from the bible,prayers and sermons from the vicars.Halfway through the service there is a collection.The money they raise is used for hymn books and bibles.There are also other ways that they raise money,by coffee mornings,jumble or garage sales.About 300 people attend church each week. The churches are looked after by wardens who cut the grass and clean the pews. In church a Sunday school is held for children.The main religion in Linton is Christian.
